February 23, 2026\n  </p>\n\n  <p><a href=\"https://docs.github.com/en/pages\">https://docs.github.com/en/pages</a></p>\n\n<h1 id=\"jekyll--github-pages--complete-user-guide\">Jekyll + GitHub Pages — Complete User Guide</h1>\n\n<p>A practical, step-by-step guide to building and deploying a Jekyll website using GitHub Pages.</p>\n\n<hr />\n\n<h1 id=\"table-of-contents\">Table of Contents</h1>\n\n<ol>\n  <li>What You’re Building</li>\n  <li>Prerequisites</li>\n  <li>Creating a New Jekyll Site</li>\n  <li>Understanding the Project Structure</li>\n  <li>Running Jekyll Locally</li>\n  <li>Creating Posts and Pages</li>\n  <li>Configuring <code class=\"language-plaintext highlighter-rouge\">_config.yml</code></li>\n  <li>Using Liquid (Templating Basics)</li>\n  <li>Preparing for GitHub Pages</li>\n  <li>Deploying to GitHub Pages</li>\n  <li>Custom Domains</li>\n  <li>Troubleshooting</li>\n  <li>Best Practices</li>\n</ol>\n\n<hr />\n\n<h1 id=\"1-what-youre-building\">1. What You’re Building</h1>\n\n<p>Jekyll is a <strong>static site generator</strong>.</p>\n\n<p>You write:</p>\n<ul>\n  <li>Markdown</li>\n  <li>HTML</li>\n  <li>YAML config</li>\n</ul>\n\n<p>Jekyll generates:</p>\n<ul>\n  <li>Static HTML files</li>\n</ul>\n\n<p>GitHub Pages hosts:</p>\n<ul>\n  <li>The generated static site</li>\n</ul>\n\n<hr />\n\n<h1 id=\"2-prerequisites\">2. Prerequisites</h1>\n\n<p>Install:</p>\n\n<ul>\n  <li>Ruby (recommended via rbenv or asdf)</li>\n  <li>Bundler</li>\n  <li>Git</li>\n  <li>GitHub account</li>\n</ul>\n\n<p>Check versions:</p>\n\n<div class=\"language-bash highlighter-rouge\"><div class=\"highlight\"><pre class=\"highlight\"><code>ruby <span class=\"nt\">-v</span>\ngem <span class=\"nt\">-v</span>\nbundle <span class=\"nt\">-v</span>\ngit <span class=\"nt\">--version</span>\n</code></pre></div></div>\n\n<hr />\n\n<h1 id=\"3-creating-a-new-jekyll-site\">3. Creating a New Jekyll Site</h1>\n\n<h2 id=\"create-project\">Create project</h2>\n\n<div class=\"language-bash highlighter-rouge\"><div class=\"highlight\"><pre class=\"highlight\"><code>gem <span class=\"nb\">install </span>jekyll bundler\njekyll new my-site\n<span class=\"nb\">cd </span>my-site\nbundle <span class=\"nb\">install</span>\n</code></pre></div></div>\n\n<h2 id=\"project-structure\">Project structure</h2>\n\n<div class=\"language-text highlighter-rouge\"><div class=\"highlight\"><pre class=\"highlight\"><code>my-site/\n├── _config.yml\n├── _posts/\n├── _layouts/\n├── _includes/\n├── _site/        (generated)\n├── Gemfile\n└── index.md\n</code></pre></div></div>\n\n<hr />\n\n<h1 id=\"4-running-jekyll-locally\">4. Running Jekyll Locally</h1>\n\n<p>Start the development server:</p>\n\n<div class=\"language-bash highlighter-rouge\"><div class=\"highlight\"><pre class=\"highlight\"><code>bundle <span class=\"nb\">exec </span>jekyll serve <span class=\"nt\">--livereload</span>\n</code></pre></div></div>\n\n<p>Visit:</p>\n\n<div class=\"language-plaintext highlighter-rouge\"><div class=\"highlight\"><pre class=\"highlight\"><code>http://localhost:4000\n</code></pre></div></div>\n\n<p>Build only:</p>\n\n<div class=\"language-bash highlighter-rouge\"><div class=\"highlight\"><pre class=\"highlight\"><code>bundle <span class=\"nb\">exec </span>jekyll build\n</code></pre></div></div>\n\n<p>Clean:</p>\n\n<div class=\"language-bash highlighter-rouge\"><div class=\"highlight\"><pre class=\"highlight\"><code>bundle <span class=\"nb\">exec </span>jekyll clean\n</code></pre></div></div>\n\n<hr />\n\n<h1 id=\"5-creating-posts\">5. Creating Posts</h1>\n\n<h2 id=\"file-naming-format\">File naming format</h2>\n\n<div class=\"language-text highlighter-rouge\"><div class=\"highlight\"><pre class=\"highlight\"><code>_posts/YYYY-MM-DD-title.md\n</code></pre></div></div>\n\n<p>Example:</p>\n\n<div class=\"language-markdown highlighter-rouge\"><div class=\"highlight\"><pre class=\"highlight\"><code><span class=\"nn\">---</span>\n<span class=\"na\">layout</span><span class=\"pi\">:</span> <span class=\"s\">post</span>\n<span class=\"na\">title</span><span class=\"pi\">:</span> <span class=\"s2\">\"</span><span class=\"s\">My</span><span class=\"nv\"> </span><span class=\"s\">First</span><span class=\"nv\"> </span><span class=\"s\">Post\"</span>\n<span class=\"na\">date</span><span class=\"pi\">:</span> <span class=\"s\">2026-02-24</span>\n<span class=\"na\">categories</span><span class=\"pi\">:</span> <span class=\"pi\">[</span><span class=\"nv\">blog</span><span class=\"pi\">]</span>\n<span class=\"na\">tags</span><span class=\"pi\">:</span> <span class=\"pi\">[</span><span class=\"nv\">jekyll</span><span class=\"pi\">,</span> <span class=\"nv\">github</span><span class=\"pi\">]</span>\n<span class=\"nn\">---</span>\n\nThis is my first post.\n</code></pre></div></div>\n\n<hr />\n\n<h1 id=\"6-creating-pages\">6. Creating Pages</h1>\n\n<p>Create a page like <code class=\"language-plaintext highlighter-rouge\">about.md</code>:</p>\n\n<div class=\"language-markdown highlighter-rouge\"><div class=\"highlight\"><pre class=\"highlight\"><code><span class=\"nn\">---</span>\n<span class=\"na\">layout</span><span class=\"pi\">:</span> <span class=\"s\">page</span>\n<span class=\"na\">title</span><span class=\"pi\">:</span> <span class=\"s\">About</span>\n<span class=\"na\">permalink</span><span class=\"pi\">:</span> <span class=\"s\">/about/</span>\n<span class=\"nn\">---</span>\n\nThis is the about page.\n</code></pre></div></div>\n\n<hr />\n\n<h1 id=\"7-understanding-_configyml\">7. Understanding <code class=\"language-plaintext highlighter-rouge\">_config.yml</code></h1>\n\n<p>Example configuration:</p>\n\n<div class=\"language-yaml highlighter-rouge\"><div class=\"highlight\"><pre class=\"highlight\"><code><span class=\"na\">title</span><span class=\"pi\">:</span> <span class=\"s\">My Website</span>\n<span class=\"na\">description</span><span class=\"pi\">:</span> <span class=\"s\">Personal blog</span>\n<span class=\"na\">url</span><span class=\"pi\">:</span> <span class=\"s2\">\"</span><span class=\"s\">https://username.github.io\"</span>\n<span class=\"na\">baseurl</span><span class=\"pi\">:</span> <span class=\"s2\">\"</span><span class=\"s\">\"</span>   <span class=\"c1\"># Use \"/repo-name\" for project sites</span>\n\n<span class=\"na\">markdown</span><span class=\"pi\">:</span> <span class=\"s\">kramdown</span>\n<span class=\"na\">permalink</span><span class=\"pi\">:</span> <span class=\"s\">/blog/:title/</span>\n\n<span class=\"na\">timezone</span><span class=\"pi\">:</span> <span class=\"s\">America/New_York</span>\n\n<span class=\"na\">plugins</span><span class=\"pi\">:</span>\n  <span class=\"pi\">-</span> <span class=\"s\">jekyll-feed</span>\n  <span class=\"pi\">-</span> <span class=\"s\">jekyll-seo-tag</span>\n</code></pre></div></div>\n\n<h2 id=\"important-baseurl\">Important: baseurl</h2>\n\n<ul>\n  <li>User site → <code class=\"language-plaintext highlighter-rouge\">\"\"</code></li>\n  <li>Project site → <code class=\"language-plaintext highlighter-rouge\">\"/repository-name\"</code></li>\n</ul>\n\n<p>Example:</p>\n\n<div class=\"language-yaml highlighter-rouge\"><div class=\"highlight\"><pre class=\"highlight\"><code><span class=\"na\">baseurl</span><span class=\"pi\">:</span> <span class=\"s2\">\"</span><span class=\"s\">/my-repo\"</span>\n</code></pre></div></div>\n\n<hr />\n\n<h1 id=\"8-using-liquid-templating\">8. Using Liquid (Templating)</h1>\n\n<h2 id=\"output-variables\">Output variables</h2>\n\n<div class=\"language-liquid highlighter-rouge\"><div class=\"highlight\"><pre class=\"highlight\"><code>Dev-pages\nGithub Pages\n</code></pre></div></div>\n\n<h2 id=\"loop-posts\">Loop posts</h2>\n\n<div class=\"language-liquid highlighter-rouge\"><div class=\"highlight\"><pre class=\"highlight\"><code>&lt;ul&gt;\n  \n    &lt;li&gt;\n      &lt;a href=\"/documents/2026/02/24/tailwind/\"&gt;\n        Tailwind\n      &lt;/a&gt;\n    &lt;/li&gt;\n  \n    &lt;li&gt;\n      &lt;a href=\"/documents/2026/02/24/markdown/\"&gt;\n        Markdown\n      &lt;/a&gt;\n    &lt;/li&gt;\n  \n    &lt;li&gt;\n      &lt;a href=\"/documents/2026/02/24/jekyll/\"&gt;\n        Jekyll\n      &lt;/a&gt;\n    &lt;/li&gt;\n  \n    &lt;li&gt;\n      &lt;a href=\"/documents/2026/02/23/github-pages/\"&gt;\n        Github Pages\n      &lt;/a&gt;\n    &lt;/li&gt;\n  \n&lt;/ul&gt;\n</code></pre></div></div>\n\n<h2 id=\"conditionals\">Conditionals</h2>\n\n<div class=\"language-liquid highlighter-rouge\"><div class=\"highlight\"><pre class=\"highlight\"><code>\n  &lt;p&gt;This is a blog post&lt;/p&gt;\n\n</code></pre></div></div>\n\n<hr />\n\n<h1 id=\"9-preparing-for-github-pages\">9. Preparing for GitHub Pages</h1>\n\n<h2 id=\"commit-your-project\">Commit your project</h2>\n\n<div class=\"language-bash highlighter-rouge\"><div class=\"highlight\"><pre class=\"highlight\"><code>git init\ngit add <span class=\"nb\">.</span>\ngit commit <span class=\"nt\">-m</span> <span class=\"s2\">\"Initial commit\"</span>\n</code></pre></div></div>\n\n<h2 id=\"create-github-repository\">Create GitHub repository</h2>\n\n<ul>\n  <li>Go to GitHub</li>\n  <li>Click “New Repository”</li>\n  <li>Name it:</li>\n</ul>\n\n<p>User site:</p>\n<div class=\"language-plaintext highlighter-rouge\"><div class=\"highlight\"><pre class=\"highlight\"><code>username.github.io\n</code></pre></div></div>\n\n<p>Project site:</p>\n<div class=\"language-plaintext highlighter-rouge\"><div class=\"highlight\"><pre class=\"highlight\"><code>my-project\n</code></pre></div></div>\n\n<hr />\n\n<h1 id=\"10-deploying-to-github-pages\">10. Deploying to GitHub Pages</h1>\n\n<h2 id=\"option-a--let-github-build-jekyll-recommended-for-simple-sites\">Option A — Let GitHub Build Jekyll (Recommended for simple sites)</h2>\n\n<p>Push to GitHub:</p>\n\n<div class=\"language-bash highlighter-rouge\"><div class=\"highlight\"><pre class=\"highlight\"><code>git remote add origin https://github.com/username/repo-name.git\ngit branch <span class=\"nt\">-M</span> main\ngit push <span class=\"nt\">-u</span> origin main\n</code></pre></div></div>\n\n<p>Then:</p>\n\n<ol>\n  <li>Go to Repository Settings</li>\n  <li>Click “Pages”</li>\n  <li>Under “Source” → Select:\n    <ul>\n      <li>Branch: <code class=\"language-plaintext highlighter-rouge\">main</code></li>\n      <li>Folder: <code class=\"language-plaintext highlighter-rouge\">/ (root)</code></li>\n    </ul>\n  </li>\n  <li>Save</li>\n</ol>\n\n<p>Your site will be available at:</p>\n\n<p>User site:</p>\n<div class=\"language-plaintext highlighter-rouge\"><div class=\"highlight\"><pre class=\"highlight\"><code>https://username.github.io\n</code></pre></div></div>\n\n<p>Project site:</p>\n<div class=\"language-plaintext highlighter-rouge\"><div class=\"highlight\"><pre class=\"highlight\"><code>https://username.github.io/repo-name/\n</code></pre></div></div>\n\n<hr />\n\n<h2 id=\"option-b--deploy-built-_site-folder-advanced\">Option B — Deploy Built <code class=\"language-plaintext highlighter-rouge\">_site/</code> Folder (Advanced)</h2>\n\n<p>Build locally:</p>\n\n<div class=\"language-bash highlighter-rouge\"><div class=\"highlight\"><pre class=\"highlight\"><code>bundle <span class=\"nb\">exec </span>jekyll build\n</code></pre></div></div>\n\n<p>Deploy <code class=\"language-plaintext highlighter-rouge\">_site/</code> contents to <code class=\"language-plaintext highlighter-rouge\">gh-pages</code> branch.</p>\n\n<p>Often done with GitHub Actions.</p>\n\n<hr />\n\n<h1 id=\"11-custom-domain\">11. Custom Domain</h1>\n\n<ol>\n  <li>Add a <code class=\"language-plaintext highlighter-rouge\">CNAME</code> file to project root:</li>\n</ol>\n\n<div class=\"language-text highlighter-rouge\"><div class=\"highlight\"><pre class=\"highlight\"><code>example.com\n</code></pre></div></div>\n\n<ol>\n  <li>Commit and push</li>\n  <li>In GitHub Pages settings:\n    <ul>\n      <li>Add custom domain</li>\n    </ul>\n  </li>\n  <li>Configure DNS:\n    <ul>\n      <li>A record → GitHub IPs</li>\n      <li>OR CNAME → username.github.io</li>\n    </ul>\n  </li>\n</ol>\n\n<hr />\n\n<h1 id=\"12-github-pages-plugin-limitations\">12. GitHub Pages Plugin Limitations</h1>\n\n<p>GitHub Pages only supports approved plugins.</p>\n\n<p>Supported examples:</p>\n<ul>\n  <li>jekyll-feed</li>\n  <li>jekyll-seo-tag</li>\n  <li>jekyll-sitemap</li>\n</ul>\n\n<p>If you need custom plugins:</p>\n<ul>\n  <li>Use GitHub Actions</li>\n  <li>Build site yourself</li>\n  <li>Deploy static output</li>\n</ul>\n\n<hr />\n\n<h1 id=\"13-drafts\">13. Drafts</h1>\n\n<p>Create <code class=\"language-plaintext highlighter-rouge\">_drafts/</code> folder.</p>\n\n<p>Add:</p>\n\n<div class=\"language-text highlighter-rouge\"><div class=\"highlight\"><pre class=\"highlight\"><code>_drafts/my-draft.md\n</code></pre></div></div>\n\n<p>Serve with:</p>\n\n<div class=\"language-bash highlighter-rouge\"><div class=\"highlight\"><pre class=\"highlight\"><code>bundle <span class=\"nb\">exec </span>jekyll serve <span class=\"nt\">--drafts</span>\n</code></pre></div></div>\n\n<hr />\n\n<h1 id=\"14-common-issues\">14. Common Issues</h1>\n\n<h2 id=\"broken-css-or-links\">Broken CSS or Links</h2>\n\n<p>Cause:</p>\n<ul>\n  <li>Incorrect <code class=\"language-plaintext highlighter-rouge\">baseurl</code></li>\n</ul>\n\n<p>Fix:\nUse:</p>\n\n<div class=\"language-liquid highlighter-rouge\"><div class=\"highlight\"><pre class=\"highlight\"><code>/assets/css/style.css\n</code></pre></div></div>\n\n<hr />\n\n<h2 id=\"404-errors\">404 Errors</h2>\n\n<p>Cause:</p>\n<ul>\n  <li>Wrong permalink</li>\n  <li>Missing trailing slash</li>\n</ul>\n\n<hr />\n\n<h2 id=\"liquid-errors\">Liquid Errors</h2>\n\n<p>Check terminal output for line numbers.</p>\n\n<hr />\n\n<h2 id=\"site-not-updating\">Site Not Updating</h2>\n\n<p>Try:</p>\n\n<div class=\"language-bash highlighter-rouge\"><div class=\"highlight\"><pre class=\"highlight\"><code>bundle <span class=\"nb\">exec </span>jekyll clean\nbundle <span class=\"nb\">exec </span>jekyll serve\n</code></pre></div></div>\n\n<hr />\n\n<h1 id=\"15-recommended-folder-structure\">15. Recommended Folder Structure</h1>\n\n<div class=\"language-text highlighter-rouge\"><div class=\"highlight\"><pre class=\"highlight\"><code>.\n├── _config.yml\n├── _layouts/\n├── _includes/\n├── _posts/\n├── _data/\n├── assets/\n│   ├── css/\n│   ├── js/\n│   └── img/\n└── index.md\n</code></pre></div></div>\n\n<hr />\n\n<h1 id=\"16-best-practices\">16. Best Practices</h1>\n\n<ul>\n  <li>Always use <code class=\"language-plaintext highlighter-rouge\">relative_url</code></li>\n  <li>Keep layouts minimal</li>\n  <li>Use collections for custom content types</li>\n  <li>Avoid heavy plugins</li>\n  <li>Keep <code class=\"language-plaintext highlighter-rouge\">_site/</code> out of git (add to <code class=\"language-plaintext highlighter-rouge\">.gitignore</code>)</li>\n  <li>Test locally before pushing</li>\n</ul>\n\n<hr />\n\n<h1 id=\"17-quick-deployment-checklist\">17. Quick Deployment Checklist</h1>\n\n<ul class=\"task-list\">\n  <li class=\"task-list-item\"><input type=\"checkbox\" class=\"task-list-item-checkbox\" disabled=\"disabled\" />Install Ruby + Bundler</li>\n  <li class=\"task-list-item\"><input type=\"checkbox\" class=\"task-list-item-checkbox\" disabled=\"disabled\" />Create Jekyll site</li>\n  <li class=\"task-list-item\"><input type=\"checkbox\" class=\"task-list-item-checkbox\" disabled=\"disabled\" />Configure <code class=\"language-plaintext highlighter-rouge\">_config.yml</code></li>\n  <li class=\"task-list-item\"><input type=\"checkbox\" class=\"task-list-item-checkbox\" disabled=\"disabled\" />Test locally</li>\n  <li class=\"task-list-item\"><input type=\"checkbox\" class=\"task-list-item-checkbox\" disabled=\"disabled\" />Create GitHub repository</li>\n  <li class=\"task-list-item\"><input type=\"checkbox\" class=\"task-list-item-checkbox\" disabled=\"disabled\" />Push code</li>\n  <li class=\"task-list-item\"><input type=\"checkbox\" class=\"task-list-item-checkbox\" disabled=\"disabled\" />Enable GitHub Pages</li>\n  <li class=\"task-list-item\"><input type=\"checkbox\" class=\"task-list-item-checkbox\" disabled=\"disabled\" />Verify live URL</li>\n</ul>\n\n<hr />\n\n<h1 id=\"18-final-workflow-summary\">18. Final Workflow Summary</h1>\n\n<div class=\"language-text highlighter-rouge\"><div class=\"highlight\"><pre class=\"highlight\"><code>Write Markdown\n      ↓\nRun jekyll serve\n      ↓\nCommit &amp; push to GitHub\n      ↓\nGitHub Pages builds site\n      ↓\nWebsite is live\n</code></pre></div></div>\n\n<hr />\n\n<p>You now have a complete workflow for building and deploying Jekyll sites with GitHub Pages.</p>\n\n</article>\n\n        </main>\n\n      </div>\n    </div>\n\n    <footer class=\"bg-slate-100 border-t border-slate-200 mt-16 dark:bg-neutral-950 dark:border-neutral-800\">\n Create a file in `_posts/` named `YYYY-MM-DD-title.md`.\n2. Add front matter and content, for example:\n\n```markdown\n---\nlayout: post\ntitle: \"My New Post\"\ndate: 2026-02-24\n---\n\nWrite your post content here.\n```\n\n3. Open `http://localhost:4000` after running `bundle exec jekyll serve` to confirm it renders.\n\n## Add a new page\n\n1. Create a new file in `pages/`, for example `pages/about.md`.\n2. Add front matter and content, for example:\n\n```markdown\n---\ntitle: \"About\"\npermalink: /about/\n---\n\nPage content goes here.\n```\n\n3. Visit `http://localhost:4000/about/` to verify the page.\n\n## Why You Should Always Use bundle exec\n\nInstead of:\n\n```bash\njekyll serve\n```\n\nYou should run:\n\n```bash\nbundle exec jekyll serve\n```\n\n## This ensures:\n\nYou're using the Jekyll version defined in your Gemfile\nNot some global Ruby version installed on your system\n\n## Run both\nIn one terminal (Ruby):\n\n```bash\nbundle exec jekyll serve\n```\n\nIn another terminal (Node):\n\n```bash\nnpm run Common gotchas

  • Missing front matter → file won’t be processed as expected
  • baseurl mismatch → broken links/assets on GitHub Pages project sites
  • Wrong permalink → 404s
  • Liquid syntax errors → build fails; check terminal output line numbers
  • Windows line endings can sometimes cause weirdness in scripts/config

Quick Templates (copy/paste)

_layouts/post.html

---
layout: default
---
<article class="prose">
  <h1>Jekyll</h1>
  <p class="meta">February 24, 2026</p>
  <article class="prose prose-lg max-w-none prose-slate dark:prose-invert dark:prose-headings:text-neutral-100 dark:prose-p:text-neutral-200 dark:prose-strong:text-neutral-100 dark:prose-a:text-sky-400 dark:hover:prose-a:text-sky-300 dark:prose-code:text-neutral-100 dark:prose-pre:bg-neutral-900 dark:prose-pre:text-neutral-100">
  <h1>Github Pages</h1>
  <p class="text-slate-500 text-sm dark:text-neutral-400 mb-8">
    February 23, 2026
  </p>

  <p><a href="https://docs.github.com/en/pages">https://docs.github.com/en/pages</a></p>

<h1 id="jekyll--github-pages--complete-user-guide">Jekyll + GitHub Pages — Complete User Guide</h1>

<p>A practical, step-by-step guide to building and deploying a Jekyll website using GitHub Pages.</p>

<hr />

<h1 id="table-of-contents">Table of Contents</h1>

<ol>
  <li>What You’re Building</li>
  <li>Prerequisites</li>
  <li>Creating a New Jekyll Site</li>
  <li>Understanding the Project Structure</li>
  <li>Running Jekyll Locally</li>
  <li>Creating Posts and Pages</li>
  <li>Configuring <code class="language-plaintext highlighter-rouge">_config.yml</code></li>
  <li>Using Liquid (Templating Basics)</li>
  <li>Preparing for GitHub Pages</li>
  <li>Deploying to GitHub Pages</li>
  <li>Custom Domains</li>
  <li>Troubleshooting</li>
  <li>Best Practices</li>
</ol>

<hr />

<h1 id="1-what-youre-building">1. What You’re Building</h1>

<p>Jekyll is a <strong>static site generator</strong>.</p>

<p>You write:</p>
<ul>
  <li>Markdown</li>
  <li>HTML</li>
  <li>YAML config</li>
</ul>

<p>Jekyll generates:</p>
<ul>
  <li>Static HTML files</li>
</ul>

<p>GitHub Pages hosts:</p>
<ul>
  <li>The generated static site</li>
</ul>

<hr />

<h1 id="2-prerequisites">2. Prerequisites</h1>

<p>Install:</p>

<ul>
  <li>Ruby (recommended via rbenv or asdf)</li>
  <li>Bundler</li>
  <li>Git</li>
  <li>GitHub account</li>
</ul>

<p>Check versions:</p>

<div class="language-bash highlighter-rouge"><div class="highlight"><pre class="highlight"><code>ruby <span class="nt">-v</span>
gem <span class="nt">-v</span>
bundle <span class="nt">-v</span>
git <span class="nt">--version</span>
</code></pre></div></div>

<hr />

<h1 id="3-creating-a-new-jekyll-site">3. Creating a New Jekyll Site</h1>

<h2 id="create-project">Create project</h2>

<div class="language-bash highlighter-rouge"><div class="highlight"><pre class="highlight"><code>gem <span class="nb">install </span>jekyll bundler
jekyll new my-site
<span class="nb">cd </span>my-site
bundle <span class="nb">install</span>
</code></pre></div></div>

<h2 id="project-structure">Project structure</h2>

<div class="language-text highlighter-rouge"><div class="highlight"><pre class="highlight"><code>my-site/
├── _config.yml
├── _posts/
├── _layouts/
├── _includes/
├── _site/        (generated)
├── Gemfile
└── index.md
</code></pre></div></div>

<hr />

<h1 id="4-running-jekyll-locally">4. Running Jekyll Locally</h1>

<p>Start the development server:</p>

<div class="language-bash highlighter-rouge"><div class="highlight"><pre class="highlight"><code>bundle <span class="nb">exec </span>jekyll serve <span class="nt">--livereload</span>
</code></pre></div></div>

<p>Visit:</p>

<div class="language-plaintext highlighter-rouge"><div class="highlight"><pre class="highlight"><code>http://localhost:4000
</code></pre></div></div>

<p>Build only:</p>

<div class="language-bash highlighter-rouge"><div class="highlight"><pre class="highlight"><code>bundle <span class="nb">exec </span>jekyll build
</code></pre></div></div>

<p>Clean:</p>

<div class="language-bash highlighter-rouge"><div class="highlight"><pre class="highlight"><code>bundle <span class="nb">exec </span>jekyll clean
</code></pre></div></div>

<hr />

<h1 id="5-creating-posts">5. Creating Posts</h1>

<h2 id="file-naming-format">File naming format</h2>

<div class="language-text highlighter-rouge"><div class="highlight"><pre class="highlight"><code>_posts/YYYY-MM-DD-title.md
</code></pre></div></div>

<p>Example:</p>

<div class="language-markdown highlighter-rouge"><div class="highlight"><pre class="highlight"><code><span class="nn">---</span>
<span class="na">layout</span><span class="pi">:</span> <span class="s">post</span>
<span class="na">title</span><span class="pi">:</span> <span class="s2">"</span><span class="s">My</span><span class="nv"> </span><span class="s">First</span><span class="nv"> </span><span class="s">Post"</span>
<span class="na">date</span><span class="pi">:</span> <span class="s">2026-02-24</span>
<span class="na">categories</span><span class="pi">:</span> <span class="pi">[</span><span class="nv">blog</span><span class="pi">]</span>
<span class="na">tags</span><span class="pi">:</span> <span class="pi">[</span><span class="nv">jekyll</span><span class="pi">,</span> <span class="nv">github</span><span class="pi">]</span>
<span class="nn">---</span>

This is my first post.
</code></pre></div></div>

<hr />

<h1 id="6-creating-pages">6. Creating Pages</h1>

<p>Create a page like <code class="language-plaintext highlighter-rouge">about.md</code>:</p>

<div class="language-markdown highlighter-rouge"><div class="highlight"><pre class="highlight"><code><span class="nn">---</span>
<span class="na">layout</span><span class="pi">:</span> <span class="s">page</span>
<span class="na">title</span><span class="pi">:</span> <span class="s">About</span>
<span class="na">permalink</span><span class="pi">:</span> <span class="s">/about/</span>
<span class="nn">---</span>

This is the about page.
</code></pre></div></div>

<hr />

<h1 id="7-understanding-_configyml">7. Understanding <code class="language-plaintext highlighter-rouge">_config.yml</code></h1>

<p>Example configuration:</p>

<div class="language-yaml highlighter-rouge"><div class="highlight"><pre class="highlight"><code><span class="na">title</span><span class="pi">:</span> <span class="s">My Website</span>
<span class="na">description</span><span class="pi">:</span> <span class="s">Personal blog</span>
<span class="na">url</span><span class="pi">:</span> <span class="s2">"</span><span class="s">https://username.github.io"</span>
<span class="na">baseurl</span><span class="pi">:</span> <span class="s2">"</span><span class="s">"</span>   <span class="c1"># Use "/repo-name" for project sites</span>

<span class="na">markdown</span><span class="pi">:</span> <span class="s">kramdown</span>
<span class="na">permalink</span><span class="pi">:</span> <span class="s">/blog/:title/</span>

<span class="na">timezone</span><span class="pi">:</span> <span class="s">America/New_York</span>

<span class="na">plugins</span><span class="pi">:</span>
  <span class="pi">-</span> <span class="s">jekyll-feed</span>
  <span class="pi">-</span> <span class="s">jekyll-seo-tag</span>
</code></pre></div></div>

<h2 id="important-baseurl">Important: baseurl</h2>

<ul>
  <li>User site → <code class="language-plaintext highlighter-rouge">""</code></li>
  <li>Project site → <code class="language-plaintext highlighter-rouge">"/repository-name"</code></li>
</ul>

<p>Example:</p>

<div class="language-yaml highlighter-rouge"><div class="highlight"><pre class="highlight"><code><span class="na">baseurl</span><span class="pi">:</span> <span class="s2">"</span><span class="s">/my-repo"</span>
</code></pre></div></div>

<hr />

<h1 id="8-using-liquid-templating">8. Using Liquid (Templating)</h1>

<h2 id="output-variables">Output variables</h2>

<div class="language-liquid highlighter-rouge"><div class="highlight"><pre class="highlight"><code>Dev-pages
Github Pages
</code></pre></div></div>

<h2 id="loop-posts">Loop posts</h2>

<div class="language-liquid highlighter-rouge"><div class="highlight"><pre class="highlight"><code>&lt;ul&gt;
  
    &lt;li&gt;
      &lt;a href="/documents/2026/02/24/tailwind/"&gt;
        Tailwind
      &lt;/a&gt;
    &lt;/li&gt;
  
    &lt;li&gt;
      &lt;a href="/documents/2026/02/24/markdown/"&gt;
        Markdown
      &lt;/a&gt;
    &lt;/li&gt;
  
    &lt;li&gt;
      &lt;a href="/documents/2026/02/24/jekyll/"&gt;
        Jekyll
      &lt;/a&gt;
    &lt;/li&gt;
  
    &lt;li&gt;
      &lt;a href="/documents/2026/02/23/github-pages/"&gt;
        Github Pages
      &lt;/a&gt;
    &lt;/li&gt;
  
&lt;/ul&gt;
</code></pre></div></div>

<h2 id="conditionals">Conditionals</h2>

<div class="language-liquid highlighter-rouge"><div class="highlight"><pre class="highlight"><code>
  &lt;p&gt;This is a blog post&lt;/p&gt;

</code></pre></div></div>

<hr />

<h1 id="9-preparing-for-github-pages">9. Preparing for GitHub Pages</h1>

<h2 id="commit-your-project">Commit your project</h2>

<div class="language-bash highlighter-rouge"><div class="highlight"><pre class="highlight"><code>git init
git add <span class="nb">.</span>
git commit <span class="nt">-m</span> <span class="s2">"Initial commit"</span>
</code></pre></div></div>

<h2 id="create-github-repository">Create GitHub repository</h2>

<ul>
  <li>Go to GitHub</li>
  <li>Click “New Repository”</li>
  <li>Name it:</li>
</ul>

<p>User site:</p>
<div class="language-plaintext highlighter-rouge"><div class="highlight"><pre class="highlight"><code>username.github.io
</code></pre></div></div>

<p>Project site:</p>
<div class="language-plaintext highlighter-rouge"><div class="highlight"><pre class="highlight"><code>my-project
</code></pre></div></div>

<hr />

<h1 id="10-deploying-to-github-pages">10. Deploying to GitHub Pages</h1>

<h2 id="option-a--let-github-build-jekyll-recommended-for-simple-sites">Option A — Let GitHub Build Jekyll (Recommended for simple sites)</h2>

<p>Push to GitHub:</p>

<div class="language-bash highlighter-rouge"><div class="highlight"><pre class="highlight"><code>git remote add origin https://github.com/username/repo-name.git
git branch <span class="nt">-M</span> main
git push <span class="nt">-u</span> origin main
</code></pre></div></div>

<p>Then:</p>

<ol>
  <li>Go to Repository Settings</li>
  <li>Click “Pages”</li>
  <li>Under “Source” → Select:
    <ul>
      <li>Branch: <code class="language-plaintext highlighter-rouge">main</code></li>
      <li>Folder: <code class="language-plaintext highlighter-rouge">/ (root)</code></li>
    </ul>
  </li>
  <li>Save</li>
</ol>

<p>Your site will be available at:</p>

<p>User site:</p>
<div class="language-plaintext highlighter-rouge"><div class="highlight"><pre class="highlight"><code>https://username.github.io
</code></pre></div></div>

<p>Project site:</p>
<div class="language-plaintext highlighter-rouge"><div class="highlight"><pre class="highlight"><code>https://username.github.io/repo-name/
</code></pre></div></div>

<hr />

<h2 id="option-b--deploy-built-_site-folder-advanced">Option B — Deploy Built <code class="language-plaintext highlighter-rouge">_site/</code> Folder (Advanced)</h2>

<p>Build locally:</p>

<div class="language-bash highlighter-rouge"><div class="highlight"><pre class="highlight"><code>bundle <span class="nb">exec </span>jekyll build
</code></pre></div></div>

<p>Deploy <code class="language-plaintext highlighter-rouge">_site/</code> contents to <code class="language-plaintext highlighter-rouge">gh-pages</code> branch.</p>

<p>Often done with GitHub Actions.</p>

<hr />

<h1 id="11-custom-domain">11. Custom Domain</h1>

<ol>
  <li>Add a <code class="language-plaintext highlighter-rouge">CNAME</code> file to project root:</li>
</ol>

<div class="language-text highlighter-rouge"><div class="highlight"><pre class="highlight"><code>example.com
</code></pre></div></div>

<ol>
  <li>Commit and push</li>
  <li>In GitHub Pages settings:
    <ul>
      <li>Add custom domain</li>
    </ul>
  </li>
  <li>Configure DNS:
    <ul>
      <li>A record → GitHub IPs</li>
      <li>OR CNAME → username.github.io</li>
    </ul>
  </li>
</ol>

<hr />

<h1 id="12-github-pages-plugin-limitations">12. GitHub Pages Plugin Limitations</h1>

<p>GitHub Pages only supports approved plugins.</p>

<p>Supported examples:</p>
<ul>
  <li>jekyll-feed</li>
  <li>jekyll-seo-tag</li>
  <li>jekyll-sitemap</li>
</ul>

<p>If you need custom plugins:</p>
<ul>
  <li>Use GitHub Actions</li>
  <li>Build site yourself</li>
  <li>Deploy static output</li>
</ul>

<hr />

<h1 id="13-drafts">13. Drafts</h1>

<p>Create <code class="language-plaintext highlighter-rouge">_drafts/</code> folder.</p>

<p>Add:</p>

<div class="language-text highlighter-rouge"><div class="highlight"><pre class="highlight"><code>_drafts/my-draft.md
</code></pre></div></div>

<p>Serve with:</p>

<div class="language-bash highlighter-rouge"><div class="highlight"><pre class="highlight"><code>bundle <span class="nb">exec </span>jekyll serve <span class="nt">--drafts</span>
</code></pre></div></div>

<hr />

<h1 id="14-common-issues">14. Common Issues</h1>

<h2 id="broken-css-or-links">Broken CSS or Links</h2>

<p>Cause:</p>
<ul>
  <li>Incorrect <code class="language-plaintext highlighter-rouge">baseurl</code></li>
</ul>

<p>Fix:
Use:</p>

<div class="language-liquid highlighter-rouge"><div class="highlight"><pre class="highlight"><code>/assets/css/style.css
</code></pre></div></div>

<hr />

<h2 id="404-errors">404 Errors</h2>

<p>Cause:</p>
<ul>
  <li>Wrong permalink</li>
  <li>Missing trailing slash</li>
</ul>

<hr />

<h2 id="liquid-errors">Liquid Errors</h2>

<p>Check terminal output for line numbers.</p>

<hr />

<h2 id="site-not-updating">Site Not Updating</h2>

<p>Try:</p>

<div class="language-bash highlighter-rouge"><div class="highlight"><pre class="highlight"><code>bundle <span class="nb">exec </span>jekyll clean
bundle <span class="nb">exec </span>jekyll serve
</code></pre></div></div>

<hr />

<h1 id="15-recommended-folder-structure">15. Recommended Folder Structure</h1>

<div class="language-text highlighter-rouge"><div class="highlight"><pre class="highlight"><code>.
├── _config.yml
├── _layouts/
├── _includes/
├── _posts/
├── _data/
├── assets/
│   ├── css/
│   ├── js/
│   └── img/
└── index.md
</code></pre></div></div>

<hr />

<h1 id="16-best-practices">16. Best Practices</h1>

<ul>
  <li>Always use <code class="language-plaintext highlighter-rouge">relative_url</code></li>
  <li>Keep layouts minimal</li>
  <li>Use collections for custom content types</li>
  <li>Avoid heavy plugins</li>
  <li>Keep <code class="language-plaintext highlighter-rouge">_site/</code> out of git (add to <code class="language-plaintext highlighter-rouge">.gitignore</code>)</li>
  <li>Test locally before pushing</li>
</ul>

<hr />

<h1 id="17-quick-deployment-checklist">17. Quick Deployment Checklist</h1>

<ul class="task-list">
  <li class="task-list-item"><input type="checkbox" class="task-list-item-checkbox" disabled="disabled" />Install Ruby + Bundler</li>
  <li class="task-list-item"><input type="checkbox" class="task-list-item-checkbox" disabled="disabled" />Create Jekyll site</li>
  <li class="task-list-item"><input type="checkbox" class="task-list-item-checkbox" disabled="disabled" />Configure <code class="language-plaintext highlighter-rouge">_config.yml</code></li>
  <li class="task-list-item"><input type="checkbox" class="task-list-item-checkbox" disabled="disabled" />Test locally</li>
  <li class="task-list-item"><input type="checkbox" class="task-list-item-checkbox" disabled="disabled" />Create GitHub repository</li>
  <li class="task-list-item"><input type="checkbox" class="task-list-item-checkbox" disabled="disabled" />Push code</li>
  <li class="task-list-item"><input type="checkbox" class="task-list-item-checkbox" disabled="disabled" />Enable GitHub Pages</li>
  <li class="task-list-item"><input type="checkbox" class="task-list-item-checkbox" disabled="disabled" />Verify live URL</li>
</ul>

<hr />

<h1 id="18-final-workflow-summary">18. Final Workflow Summary</h1>

<div class="language-text highlighter-rouge"><div class="highlight"><pre class="highlight"><code>Write Markdown
      ↓
Run jekyll serve
      ↓
Commit &amp; push to GitHub
      ↓
GitHub Pages builds site
      ↓
Website is live
</code></pre></div></div>

<hr />

<p>You now have a complete workflow for building and deploying Jekyll sites with GitHub Pages.</p>

</article>

</article>

layout: page
title: Blog
permalink: /blog/

Simple nav include (_includes/header.html)

<header>
  <a href="/">Dev-pages</a>
  <nav>
    <a href="/blog/">Blog</a>
    <a href="/about/">About</a>
  </nav>
</header>

Handy Reference: Variables You’ll Use Most

Site-level

  • site.title, site.description
  • site.url, site.baseurl
  • site.posts
  • site.pages
  • site.data.*
  • site.collections

Page/post-level

  • page.title, page.url, page.permalink
  • page.date, page.categories, page.tags
  • content (only inside layouts)

Checklist: Starting a New Jekyll Site

  • Create _config.yml with url and baseurl
  • Add _layouts/default.html with `<article class="prose prose-lg max-w-none prose-slate dark:prose-invert dark:prose-headings:text-neutral-100 dark:prose-p:text-neutral-200 dark:prose-strong:text-neutral-100 dark:prose-a:text-sky-400 dark:hover:prose-a:text-sky-300 dark:prose-code:text-neutral-100 dark:prose-pre:bg-neutral-900 dark:prose-pre:text-neutral-100">

    Github Pages

    February 23, 2026

    https://docs.github.com/en/pages

Jekyll + GitHub Pages — Complete User Guide

A practical, step-by-step guide to building and deploying a Jekyll website using GitHub Pages.

Table of Contents

  1. What You’re Building
  2. Prerequisites
  3. Creating a New Jekyll Site
  4. Understanding the Project Structure
  5. Running Jekyll Locally
  6. Creating Posts and Pages
  7. Configuring _config.yml
  8. Using Liquid (Templating Basics)
  9. Preparing for GitHub Pages
  10. Deploying to GitHub Pages
  11. Custom Domains
  12. Troubleshooting
  13. Best Practices

1. What You’re Building

Jekyll is a static site generator.

You write:

  • Markdown
  • HTML
  • YAML config

Jekyll generates:

  • Static HTML files

GitHub Pages hosts:

  • The generated static site

2. Prerequisites

Install:

  • Ruby (recommended via rbenv or asdf)
  • Bundler
  • Git
  • GitHub account

Check versions:

ruby -v
gem -v
bundle -v
git --version

3. Creating a New Jekyll Site

Create project

gem install jekyll bundler
jekyll new my-site
cd my-site
bundle install

Project structure

my-site/
├── _config.yml
├── _posts/
├── _layouts/
├── _includes/
├── _site/        (generated)
├── Gemfile
└── index.md

4. Running Jekyll Locally

Start the development server:

bundle exec jekyll serve --livereload

Visit:

http://localhost:4000

Build only:

bundle exec jekyll build

Clean:

bundle exec jekyll clean

5. Creating Posts

File naming format

_posts/YYYY-MM-DD-title.md

Example:

---
layout: post
title: "My First Post"
date: 2026-02-24
categories: [blog]
tags: [jekyll, github]
---

This is my first post.

6. Creating Pages

Create a page like about.md:

---
layout: page
title: About
permalink: /about/
---

This is the about page.

7. Understanding _config.yml

Example configuration:

title: My Website
description: Personal blog
url: "https://username.github.io"
baseurl: ""   # Use "/repo-name" for project sites

markdown: kramdown
permalink: /blog/:title/

timezone: America/New_York

plugins:
  - jekyll-feed
  - jekyll-seo-tag

Important: baseurl

  • User site → ""
  • Project site → "/repository-name"

Example:

baseurl: "/my-repo"

8. Using Liquid (Templating)

Output variables

Dev-pages
Github Pages

Loop posts

<ul>
  
    <li>
      <a href="/documents/2026/02/24/tailwind/">
        Tailwind
      </a>
    </li>
  
    <li>
      <a href="/documents/2026/02/24/markdown/">
        Markdown
      </a>
    </li>
  
    <li>
      <a href="/documents/2026/02/24/jekyll/">
        Jekyll
      </a>
    </li>
  
    <li>
      <a href="/documents/2026/02/23/github-pages/">
        Github Pages
      </a>
    </li>
  
</ul>

Conditionals


  <p>This is a blog post</p>

9. Preparing for GitHub Pages

Commit your project

git init
git add .
git commit -m "Initial commit"

Create GitHub repository

  • Go to GitHub
  • Click “New Repository”
  • Name it:

User site:

username.github.io

Project site:

my-project

10. Deploying to GitHub Pages

Option A — Let GitHub Build Jekyll (Recommended for simple sites)

Push to GitHub:

git remote add origin https://github.com/username/repo-name.git
git branch -M main
git push -u origin main

Then:

  1. Go to Repository Settings
  2. Click “Pages”
  3. Under “Source” → Select:
    • Branch: main
    • Folder: / (root)
  4. Save

Your site will be available at:

User site:

https://username.github.io

Project site:

https://username.github.io/repo-name/

Option B — Deploy Built _site/ Folder (Advanced)

Build locally:

bundle exec jekyll build

Deploy _site/ contents to gh-pages branch.

Often done with GitHub Actions.

11. Custom Domain

  1. Add a CNAME file to project root:
example.com
  1. Commit and push
  2. In GitHub Pages settings:
    • Add custom domain
  3. Configure DNS:
    • A record → GitHub IPs
    • OR CNAME → username.github.io

12. GitHub Pages Plugin Limitations

GitHub Pages only supports approved plugins.

Supported examples:

  • jekyll-feed
  • jekyll-seo-tag
  • jekyll-sitemap

If you need custom plugins:

  • Use GitHub Actions
  • Build site yourself
  • Deploy static output

13. Drafts

Create _drafts/ folder.

Add:

_drafts/my-draft.md

Serve with:

bundle exec jekyll serve --drafts

14. Common Issues

Broken CSS or Links

Cause:

  • Incorrect baseurl

Fix: Use:

/assets/css/style.css

404 Errors

Cause:

  • Wrong permalink
  • Missing trailing slash

Liquid Errors

Check terminal output for line numbers.

Site Not Updating

Try:

bundle exec jekyll clean
bundle exec jekyll serve

15. Recommended Folder Structure

.
├── _config.yml
├── _layouts/
├── _includes/
├── _posts/
├── _data/
├── assets/
│   ├── css/
│   ├── js/
│   └── img/
└── index.md

16. Best Practices

  • Always use relative_url
  • Keep layouts minimal
  • Use collections for custom content types
  • Avoid heavy plugins
  • Keep _site/ out of git (add to .gitignore)
  • Test locally before pushing

17. Quick Deployment Checklist

  • Install Ruby + Bundler
  • Create Jekyll site
  • Configure _config.yml
  • Test locally
  • Create GitHub repository
  • Push code
  • Enable GitHub Pages
  • Verify live URL

18. Final Workflow Summary

Write Markdown
      ↓
Run jekyll serve
      ↓
Commit & push to GitHub
      ↓
GitHub Pages builds site
      ↓
Website is live

You now have a complete workflow for building and deploying Jekyll sites with GitHub Pages.

</article> `

  • Add _includes/head.html, header.html, footer.html
  • Create index.md
  • Add first post in _posts/
  • Serve locally with bundle exec jekyll serve --livereload
  • Deploy _site/ or let GitHub Pages build (depending on plugin needs)
